SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT users.LEC_USER_ID,TO_CHAR(USER_BIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD') USER_BIRTH, USER_PHONE, USER_EMAIL, User_Regdate, large_category, small_category FROM users JOIN LECTURE_STUDENT ON users.LEC_USER_ID=LECTURE_STUDENT.lec_Stu_User_Id JOIN LECTURE on LECTURE.lec_Num=LECTURE_STUDENT.lec_Stu_Ref_Group
AND lec_Stu_User_Id LIKE '%'||#{lecStuUserId}||'%' AND USER_BIRTH LIKE '%'||#{userBirth}||'%' AND USER_PHONE LIKE '%'||#{userPhone}||'%' AND USER_EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{userEmail}||'%' AND USER_REGDATE LIKE '%'||#{userRegdate}||'%' AND large_category=#{largeCategory} AND large_category=#{largeCategory} AND small_category=#{smallCategory} AND general_user_code = 'Y'
ORDER BY users.LEC_USER_ID DESC) result1)
WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE_STUDENT (lec_Stu_Num, lec_Stu_User_Id, lec_Stu_Ref_Group, User_Regdate) VALUES(LECTURE_STUDENT_seq.NEXTVAL, #{lecStuUserId}, #{lecStuRefGroup}, SYSDATE)
